recipesJson.name: Strawberries and Scream
recipesJson.author: Vapechemist
recipesJson.description:
Strawberries and cream???? Yea I think so and very good I would say! Y'all let me know what y'all think. 
Steep for 5 days to a week at least.

reviews.text: Looks incredible! What's up with the percentages? I admit that I started mixing by drops, then got some syringes, and finally bought a decent scale.
